GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.91
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: Fix possible deadlock in rfcomm_sk_state_change

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.91 by commit 98aec50ff7f60cc6f2d6a4396b475c547e58b04d, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 1804fdf6e494e5e2938c65d8391690b59bcff897. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Bluetooth: Fix possible deadlock in rfcomm_sk_state_change
OSV.details:
